name: 世纪0：寄生之塔 Century 0:Parasitic Tower
name_original: 世纪0：寄生之塔 Century 0:Parasitic Tower
description:
Plot Description



It is said that there is such a strange tower, the tower of beautiful illusion born in the Victorian era due to the strong desire of peacekeepers for happiness. Although it seems illogical, it really happened.

In the middle ages, punk, the tower God, was popular for some time. How to say, at that time, people enjoyed the happiness brought by an illusory tower. Everything people wanted on that day will appear inside the tower the day after tomorrow. Because of this very powerful and universal function, people flocked to move near the tower and just need to think about what they want next all day. Because people rely too much on it and it is like a God, people call it "tower God".

……

However, the punk period of the tower God will not last too long, because after a short time, the world will be peaceful, and people will live a happy life. The world is peaceful. The tower has no room for human happiness. At that time, more and more people chose to believe in science, and the tower lost its position as the center of people, so it dissipated in the air.

……

The moment when the tower reappears is the moment when the peacemaker it once raised and the later generations of the latter disappear completely! I don't know. After centuries, it reappeared! In an age when people are very peaceful, it destroys all beauty! As it recovers, all colors become so dark, as if they were back centuries ago!



How to play



In this game, you are a redeemed soul. Given by something, you become the host of the body of a condemned prisoner and get the chance to be redeemed, but you need to complete one task: go to the center of the city and destroy the parasitic tower. However, this task is not simple. It is also the main story of the game.

There are three game modes in this game: comprehensive mode, parasitic tower mode and battle mode. The comprehensive mode is compatible with all playing methods. You can enjoy the randomness of roguelike, the interest of the story and the suspense of decryption. Parasitic tower mode is the so-called tower climbing mode. You only need to choose your soul and talent. You can spend time climbing the tower and playing boss. In battle mode, you can choose your character, choose your enemy, and fight in different attributes to master the game operation.

There are 8 kinds of souls in the game, including knight, mage, warrior, Centaur, Archer, mechanical life, assassin and slave. The value of each soul is different and the difficulty is also different. You can choose at your discretion.

At present, there are more than 50 kinds of weapons available in the game. The main types of weapons are knife, sword, dagger, spear, hammer, axe and bow.

The highest level of each class is different, but the highest level is currently level 60.

The battle mode of the game is currently round system, but it may change in the future.



Warning



The game may not be as fun as you think. If the game has shortcomings, welcome to the comment area for discussion. Of course, if it is too unsatisfactory, you can choose to refund.
